channel.title: Make weapons attack faster? Change the max cb lvl?

item.title: Make weapons attack faster? Change the max cb lvl?
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

Some Servers Have 185 For Combat Even when max lvl is 99 but… i never really messed around with that, other than that d r u g is right just change the action timer.

I might be able to mess around and try to figure out how to make it 126 if i get a base with 185.

item.source: Make weapons attack faster? Change the max cb lvl?

item.title: Make weapons attack faster? Change the max cb lvl?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

you cant really hcnage your combat… you can change your max stat so that it gets your combat to a certain lv… and you can do that by searching “return ##” and the ## means the max you have currently, like if you have 99… then search return 99. then change the 99…
